Title: Transcendence
Overview: Two leading computer scientists work toward their goal of Technological Singularity,  as a radical anti-technology organization fights to prevent them from creating a world where computers can transcend the abilities of the human brain.
Tagline: Yesterday, Dr. Will Caster was only human...
Keywords: artificial intelligence, technology, nanotechnology, computer virus, super computer, resurrection, love, mind control, terrorism, scientist, extremist, moral dilemma, computer scientist, mind transfer, quantum computer, mind uploading
production_companies: Alcon Entertainment, Syncopy, DMG Entertainment, Straight Up Films
Cast: Johnny Depp, Paul Bettany, Rebecca Hall
